intro: Psychotria ardisiifolia, commonly known as the red-eyed wonder, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its striking red flowers with yellow centers, which are clustered in dense inflorescences. It typically grows as an evergreen shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Psychotria ardisiifolia is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant and showy blooms.
